__e: Ella, ...you have to help us help you.
Ella, you are so smart, and you're very beautiful, but you live in a motel.
Ella, do you realize what you just did?
Sorry to hear about you and Ella.
If Ella don't come, his uncle is more than sick.

Ella couldn't wait to write down all that had happened, so that she might remember every single bit of it just as if she were telling her mother and father about the palace ball and her time with the prince.
You see, the thing is Ella is absolutely desperate to go on a date with me, but for some reason she is feeling guilty about the whole thing.
So why don't you just tell us right now where Ella is, all right?
